page.title: 01OUR BLOCK
page.content: Our block has one village in it, Lewknor, and two hamlets,Shirburn and Pyrton. It is located at the foot of the Chiltern Hills (on the western side). We are about 16 miles from Oxford. The villages are easily accessible from both London and Oxford because the M40 motorway runs just to the North of them. The block does not have many amenities. It is mainly farmland. In Lewknor we have a primary school, a church, a shop and Post Office combined, an agricultural machinary supplier and a public house.Pyrton has a pub, a garden centre, and a church. There is a private castle with a church at Shirburn. Our nearest towns are Watlington, which is 2 miles away, and Thame, which is 6 miles away.
